special_text:
[+1]: Look at the top card of target player's library, then you may have each player mill a card.
[0]: Reveal the top two cards of your library. An opponent chooses one. Put the chosen card into your hand and the other into your graveyard.
[-3]: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
[-8]: You get an emblem with “Whenever you cast a spell, each opponent sacrifices a creature or planeswalker.” Until end of turn, you may play cards from your graveyard.
